name: Stone Summoners
description:
Shamans are summoning some ancient stones using an old ritual. You must stop them before it's too late!

Features

- Destructible environment: some elements are fully destructible, shoot to them to see what you can do!

- Online leaderboard: compete to beat the world with an online leaderboard for each level! [note that this feature doesn't work with the HTML5 version]

- Fully keyboard/mouse and controller support!

- Tutorial map: learn how to play with the tutorial map!

- Accessibility: you can change the sound effects or music volume separately.

Done for the Godot Wild Jam 50.

Credits

- Color palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/vinik24

- Music and FX: Various

- Font: https://www.dafont.com/it/pixel-bit-advanced.font?l[]=10&l[]=1
